attributes.action: A Million Small Wind Turbines In The Uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A million little turbines will generate just as much FREE power as a few large wind farms. Plus, if mass produced the cost per unit would become more affordable, and this would encourage households in the Uk to install a wind turbine. 
We have hundreds of thousands of Telegraph Poles, Lampposts, and even Electricity Pylons in the Uk - of all which could be used to harvest FREE power.
